summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear and produce subscriber records for specified phone numbers from 2000-2005 for the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)) for which the subpoena is issued to obtain phone records.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Subpoena Appearance Date
events.description: The date by which the subpoena recipient is commanded to appear in court and produce requested phone subscriber records.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The subpoena seeks subscriber records for unspecified phone numbers from the period 2000-2005.
The records are demanded for use in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (AJN)).
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss on July 28, 2021, with a court appearance required on November 29, 2021.
Failure to comply constitutes contempt of court and subjects the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
